products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux pvc blackout white roller blind in white. Made to measure from 10.04 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the unilux pvc blackout white roller blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant pvc and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx0908 fabric colour: white material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Unilux White (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure unilux white (moisture resistant) bathroom roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality bathroom roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
